= Jupyter Notebook
:url-docs: https://jupyter-notebook.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

{url-docs}[[docs\]]

The classic Jupyter Notebook

== Installation

[source,bash]
----
python -m pip install notebook
----

== Usage

[source,bash]
----
jupyter notebook
----

[source,bash]
----
jupyter notebook --help
----

== Shortcuts

`dd`:: delete cell(s)
`c`:: copy cell
`x`:: cut cell
`v`:: paste cell below

`a`:: insert cell above
`b`:: insert cell below

`y`:: change cell to `code`
`m`:: change cell to `markdown`
